select top(#{3}) c.TabId,c.ClassId,c.MsgContent,c.PublisherId,c.PublishDate ,c.EncType,c.EncAddr,c.EncImgAddr from SpaceContentStatus ss,ClassSpace c where ss.SpaceId=c.TabId and ss.IsRead=0 and c.Status=1 and ss.SpaceType=#{1} and ss.UserId = #{0} and c.TabId not in (select top((#{2}-1) * #{3}) c.TabId from SpaceContentStatus ss,ClassSpace c where ss.SpaceId=c.TabId and ss.IsRead=0 and c.Status=1 and ss.SpaceType=#{1} and ss.UserId = #{0} order by c.PublishDate desc) order by c.PublishDate desc
